title: Duma and Natl. People's Congress dom. by one party

content.question: One similarity between Russia’s Duma and China’s National People’s Congress is that both have

choices.label: played a significant role in making policy
been dominated by one political party
taken the lead on promoting environmental sustainability

content.answer: been dominated by one political party

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
